data.title: Villa Rica, GA Reviews
data.meta_description: Explore 89 Villa Rica reviews from current residents.
data.text:
I first moved to Villa Rica in 2020 and I was a bit curious to see if this new place will be good. I was a high school junior, and I was unsure if I wanted to go to college. As I kept going to school and other stores in Villa Rica, I realized that this was truly a good opportunity to get to know people, hear their experiences, and be part of a community regardless of race. This a very knitted community dedicated to helping one another and passersby. One thing I would love to change about Villa Rica is the gardens on the roadside. Planting fresh flowers to enhance the beauty of Villa Rica, the home of the rich.

I've only been a resident of Villa Rica for a few months now. It's a good area to live because there isn't much traffic. Only when the roadway is backed up or when there is a wreck is there substantial traffic. I believe it is an excellent area to raise a family, and the educational system appears to be adequate.

Small town near Atlanta, friendly, great cost of living. I have lived here all my life and have enjoyed the simple life style with access to all the amenities Atlanta offers. With Atlanta just a sort drive living Villa Rica gives one the best of both worlds.
